DOC.brief_summary: The main objective is to highlight, by functional imaging (MRI) dysfunctional brain regions associated with vulnerability to suicidal behavior.
DOC.brief_title: Functional Neuroimaging and Genetic Vulnerability to Suicidal Behavior
